project.name: Repose Services - Datastore POM
project.description:
By default, a Repose datastore is local, but a distributed datastore can be configured. This allows the data for an entire cluster to be "striped" across all of the nodes.
This is accomplished by each node exposing it's own local datastore to the cluster via this Service. It is also necessary to configure each of the nodes in a cluster being with the same hash-ring seed. The node a specific piece of data is stored on is determined by the hash of the key for that data.
